CustomField.description: This is a date field that stores the Date that AP Dates can be set back to.Example: When set to June 30th, 2025, a user can update an AP Date received date as far back as July 1, 2025. Validation Rules will block the ability to set an AP Date before this date.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a date field that stores the Date that AP Dates can be set back to.Example: When set to June 30th, 2025, a user can update an AP Date received date as far back as July 1, 2025. Validation Rules will block the ability to set an AP Date before this date.
CustomField.label: AP Closed Books Date
